body_html: If I pass in the batch_size as a parameter when initializing the class, then I can get it to work, but batch_size varies with each iteration so having it as part of the model initialization isn't ideal.
body_text: If I pass in the batch_size as a parameter when initializing the class, then I can get it to work, but batch_size varies with each iteration so having it as part of the model initialization isn't ideal.
body: If I pass in the `batch_size` as a parameter when initializing the class, then I can get it to work, but `batch_size` varies with each iteration so having it as part of the model initialization isn't ideal.
